mapper.insert: insert into review ( review_idx, store_idx, review_writer, review_star, review_title, review_content, review_image, review_regdate ) values( review_seq.nextval, #{store_idx}, #{review_writer}, #{review_star}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, #{review_image}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update review set review_writer = #{review_writer}, review_star = #{review_star}, review_title = #{review_title}, review_content = #{review_content}, review_image = #{review_image}, review_regdate = sysdate where review_idx = #{review_idx}
